Khonkolor::

Khonkolor follow them and said "Hey who's the next guy with I'm going 
to fight??? can you tell me what happened with my friends Hot rod and 
my commander Epyon?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Bongiovi:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> The lasers hit Bongiovi again, instantly killing him.
>

the 
> stands to view the other matches, several soldiers approaching 
Khonkolor and

out of the
